content: add a navbar with navlinks home, about and contact

add a sidebar with navlinks home, about and contact

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Would you like the sidebar to be fixed or collapsible?", "option1": "Fixed - It will always be visible on the side of the page.", "option2": "Collapsible - Users can choose to expand or hide it."}, {"question 2": "On which side of the page do you prefer the sidebar to be?", "option1": "Left side of the page.", "option2": "Right side of the page."}], "input_token_count": 265, "output_token_count": 104, "time_taken": "0:00:03.564276"}

The user requested a sidebar with navigation links titled "home," "about," and "contact." The AI offered a checklist of additional features to consider, including user authentication, a real-time blockchain news feed, a "Favorites" section, search functionality, and social media sharing options, some of which the user indicated were completed. The AI also posed questions regarding the navbar's design and submit button position, offering various options for each. Subsequently, the user requested the addition of a "Submit" button, which the AI acknowledged. In another series of questions, the AI inquired whether the navbar should remain fixed at the top or be dynamic when scrolling and whether it should adapt its style to indicate the current page. After confirming the request for a navbar with the specified links, the AI asked the user to describe the project further.
